column2: At last, in part 5, you'll create your own big, freaky monster!
Welcome back, {{user_name}}! I'd recommend doing the previous parts of this quest if you haven't already. If you have, or you're forging ahead, plug in your mouse and let's mash together a monster!
The easiest way to follow along with these tutorials is to adjust your windows so that you can see both Blender and the video.
Have fun! Remember, you can always restart this activity if you need to see the tips or link.
